details.script_description: The script runs a simulation using Grendel CUDA and Python. It first sets up the environment by loading the required software and setting environment variables. Then, it copies the simulation code from the original directory to the working directory, compiles the code, and runs three instances of the simulation script 'continue_sim.py' in the background. Finally, it copies the output files from the working directory to the original directory and prints the end time.
